trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner"></xref> class.
Creates an empty <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object.
The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.CreateField> method is called when the designer does not have schema information about the field.
An empty field object.
Creates a new <xref href="System.Web.DynamicData.DynamicField"></xref> object by using the specified data field information.
Schema information that contains the structure of the data field.
A new field object.
Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField"></xref> field for the specified data field.

The <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.CreateTemplateField%2A> method is invoked by the designer when it converts a data control field into a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object.
The data field object.
The data-bound control that contains the data field object.
The new template field.
Gets the default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
The default text that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Gets the name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
The data field object.
The name that is displayed for the data field in the fields editor.
Gets the content of the template field.
The data field object.
The display mode for the specified data field.
The content of the template field.
Gets a value that indicates whether the data field is enabled in the fields editor.
If the <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.Design.DynamicFieldDesigner.IsEnabled%2A> method returns `false`, the data field will not be displayed in the fields editor.
This occurs when the data-bound control does not contain the field yet
The data-bound control whose data control fields are being edited.
`true` if the data field is enabled in the fields editor; `false` if the data field will not be displayed in the fields editor.
Gets a value that indicates whether schema information is used to load the data fields.
`true` in all cases.
